content:
Dear [Archis Academy],

We at Concreate are thrilled to have the opportunity to work with you as a reseller or sales partner. We have a lot of experience in creating 3D assets and virtual environments for various applications such as architectural visualisation, digital twin, gaming, metaverses, product visualisation, advertising, educational training, virtual and augmented reality experiences.

Our team of talented designers and animators utilize state-of-the-art technology to craft visually captivating and interactive digital assets that cater to the needs of our clients. Whether it's creating realistic 3D models of real-world objects or designing immersive virtual worlds, Concreate has the proficiency and experience to deliver outstanding results.

We understand that your academy is focused on educating students in the field of architecture and design. Our services could be a great asset for your academy to provide students with more engaging, interactive and realistic experiences in their learning.

We propose that Concreate will be a reseller or sales partner for Archis Academy. Under this agreement, Concreate will provide you with a commission of [X%] on each sale of our services that is generated through your academy.

We look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you, and hope to be able to collaborate soon.

Thank you for your consideration.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Concreate
